name: places/ChIJh5zibKVZwokRah6aJ7Z16uU
formattedAddress: 244 Elizabeth St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 244 Elizabeth St, New York, NY 10012-3576, USA

originalText.text: Lisa Regina is an amazing acting coach and teacher!! If you’re serious about taking your craft to the next level, Lisa can help you get there. She is professional, talented, dedicated, and actually cares about her students and their careers. You’ll learn so many great techniques and skills! Lisa will also help prepare you for auditions, so you’ll feel confident and ready as you walk into each one! Thank you Lisa!!

text.text: Lisa Regina is an amazing acting coach and teacher!! If you’re serious about taking your craft to the next level, Lisa can help you get there. She is professional, talented, dedicated, and actually cares about her students and their careers. You’ll learn so many great techniques and skills! Lisa will also help prepare you for auditions, so you’ll feel confident and ready as you walk into each one! Thank you Lisa!!

originalText.text: Lisa has been an amazing coach/mentor. She has been coaching me through my screenplay. She has encouraged me to keep pushing forward and to continue to work harder. She has helped me to naturally bring out my creativity. I am very grateful for the opportunity she gave me to be on set with her. I got to see the words of her own screenplay come to life with the help of her wonderful actors, many of which were also her students. It was a great opportunity that Lisa was able to give us and a real example of how she will go above and beyond for her students.

originalText.text:
New York Acting Coach Lisa Regina is a rare find in South Jersey!  I am very fortunate to have studied with Lisa for over four years now.  Lisa comes from a wealth of professional experience.
She is very committed and truly cares about her students.  Lisa continues to encourage me to work hard at my craft which will take my career to the next level!

text.text:
New York Acting Coach Lisa Regina is a rare find in South Jersey!  I am very fortunate to have studied with Lisa for over four years now.  Lisa comes from a wealth of professional experience.
She is very committed and truly cares about her students.  Lisa continues to encourage me to work hard at my craft which will take my career to the next level!

originalText.text:
Lisa Regina is a wonderful acting coach. She always makes the actor feel comfortable and bring out their inner potential. I always love breaking down audition scripts with her and going over the characters. She has been doing this for so long that her experience really shows. I recommend her to everyone.
Thank you Lisa!

text.text:
Lisa Regina is a wonderful acting coach. She always makes the actor feel comfortable and bring out their inner potential. I always love breaking down audition scripts with her and going over the characters. She has been doing this for so long that her experience really shows. I recommend her to everyone.
Thank you Lisa!

originalText.text: I’ve studied with Lisa since I was 14 years old and she has always given me the honest and necessary feedback to grow me as an actor and as a person. It’s now been five years and I have grown immensely and feel prepared to enter audition rooms with my best foot forward. She has enabled me to feel strong and empowered in my own skin which is imperative as a young woman and as an actor. I’d recommend Lisa for anyone seriously interested in pursuing a career in the acting industry as she is overflowing with knowledge and advice whether you are just starting or have been pursuing this career for years. Class is the highlight of my week!
